metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12097 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The liblnk_location_information_read_data function in liblnk_location_information.c in liblnk through 2018-04-19 allows remote attackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted lnk file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/liblnk issue 33 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
